name: Beach Crawlers
description:
Controls
WASD to move
Mouse to aim
Left mouse button to start game, pick up rock, throw rock and punch crab

Objective
Protect the sandcastle before the crabs destroy it by either throwing rocks at them or punching them

Gametime
Around a minute or two

Game made in four days for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) Game Jam
